attributes.title: House Haigh
allegiance: House Baratheon of Dragonstone'''House Haigh''' is a knightly house from the Riverlands sworn to House Frey.==History=====Season 4===Davos Seaworth reports to Stannis Baratheon he has managed to secure the support of some noble houses, among them House Haigh.<ref>"Breaker of Chains"</ref>==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, House Haigh is a loyal vassal of House Frey. Their sigil is a black pitchfork on a golden bar sinister on russet. They participate in the Red Wedding, fighting on the side of their liege lords.==See also==*AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)==References==ReflistRiver HousesDEFAULTSORT:Haigh, HouseCategory:Houses from the RiverlandsCategory:Noble housesCategory:Vassal housesCategory:Knightly houses

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Haigh is a loyal vassal of House Frey. Their sigil is a black pitchfork on a golden bar sinister on russet. They participate in the [[Red Wedding]], fighting on the side of their liege lords.
sections.History:
===[[Season 4]]===
[[Davos Seaworth]] reports to [[Stannis Baratheon]] he has managed to secure the support of some noble houses, among them House Haigh.<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>
